### Load packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

### Load data

```{r}
data <- read_tsv("data/01_dat_load.tsv")
```

### Clean up data

```{r}
clean_data <- data |> 
  filter(rowSums(across(where(is.numeric))) > 0)
```

### Save data for later use

```{r}
#Then save it to the data folder for later use
write_tsv(clean_data, "data/02_dat_clean.tsv")
```
